MEI.msDesc

Manuscript description component declarations.

Elements in MEI.msDesc

accMat, addDesc, binding, bindingDesc, catchwords, collation, colophon, decoDesc, decoNote, explicit, foliation, heraldry, layout, layoutDesc, locus, locusGrp, rubric, scriptDesc, scriptNote, seal, sealDesc, secFolio, signatures, stamp, support, supportDesc, typeDesc, typeNote

Model Classes in MEI.msDesc

Macro Groups in MEI.msDesc

– no macro groups defined in MEI.msDesc –
